title: Live Activity Push Notification Details
description: Information regarding live activity notifications, such as mobile application, device details and push to start token.

xdm:liveActivityPushNotificationDetails.title: Live Activity Push details
xdm:liveActivityPushNotificationDetails.description: Live activity push details array containing notification info required to send mobile live activity push notification to a specific mobile application on a given device for an activityType/attributeType.

xdm:token.title: Push to Start Token
xdm:token.description: Valid push to start token for the given push platform for starting a live activity.

xdm:platform.title: Live Activity Push Platform
xdm:platform.description: Push provider, e.g. apns, apnsSandbox or fcm

xdm:denylisted.title: Denylist Flag
xdm:denylisted.description: Indicates whether the push to start token is blocked by the push provider for starting a live activity.

xdm:appID.title: Application Identifier
xdm:appID.description: Unique Identifier for the mobile application.

xdm:identity.title: Identity associated with this push to start token
xdm:identity.description: The identity associated with this push to start token before profile stitching.

xdm:attributeType.title: Live Activity Attribute Type or Activity Type
xdm:attributeType.description: The attribute type or activity type for the live activity.
